heading: HR01659
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE REAL STATE OF OUR COUNTRY'S RICE SUPPLY IN VIEW OF PROPOSING APPROPRIATE MEASURES TO ADDRESS POSSIBLE SHORTAGE AS WELL AS TO INSTITUTE POLICIES TO IMPROVE DOMESTIC RICE PRODUCTION AND ENSURE THE COUNTRY'S FOOD SECURITY
status: Pending with the Committee on AGRICULTURE AND FOOD since 2018-02-21
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01659
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE REAL STATE OF OUR COUNTRY'S RICE SUPPLY IN VIEW OF PROPOSING APPROPRIATE MEASURES TO ADDRESS POSSIBLE SHORTAGE AS WELL AS TO INSTITUTE POLICIES TO IMPROVE DOMESTIC RICE PRODUCTION AND ENSURE THE COUNTRY'S FOOD SECURITY
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SALON, ORESTES T.
DATE FILED : 2018-02-07
